name: Solid I
overview: A pretty nice vertically scrolling space shooter published in Magic Disk 64 1988/07, and also in Stonysoft #0404. 'Solid I' is a space game with a lot of action, good sound, and above all great graphics that can easily keep up with the graphics of commercially available software! There you will find a lot of enemy spaceships and UFOs who want to make life difficult for you. A total of three spaceships are available to you to complete your mission. Good luck and happy shooting! The game was developed by Thomas Koncina & Thorsten Koytka using Chris Yates' Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit.
